EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Panel Session Spring Boot Team_New York_Q119.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Q&A Panel Session with the Spring Team | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Q&A Panel Session with the Spring Team <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/QA-Panel-Session-with-the-Spring-Team.html]]>.
Date: Wednesday, January 16, 2019
Time:
6:30PM to 8:30PM
Location:
Pivotal NYC Office <[[https://pivotal.io/locations/new-york]]> 636 Avenue of the Americas New York, NY 10011
We look forward to seeing you there! Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team Agenda <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/QA-Panel-Session-with-the-Spring-Team.html]]>
